'''False Worm Bait''' is used in [[Fishing]]. It can be used to catch [[Butterflyfish]] and its variants.

The [[formula]] can be bought from [[Nantuck]] of the [[Mondstadt Fishing Association]] with 3 [[Medaka]] fishes.

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Crafting
|Slime Condensate = 1
|Berry = 1
|yield = 10
|sort = Slime Condensate;Berry
}}
